prompts: Create a cute, brown quadruped Pokemon that resembles a beaver, with a playful personality.
Imagine a small, furry Normal-type Pokemon with large front teeth and a big belly.
Generate a Pokemon that thrives in forest habitats, with a round body and cheerful expression.
Design a charming Pokemon that has a brown color scheme and enjoys building dams.
Show me a friendly Pokemon with distinct buck teeth and a soft, cuddly appearance.
Make a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of nature, featuring earthy tones and a playful stance.
Give me a rotund Pokemon that has a love for water and is often found near rivers.
